Joey McCarthy
=============

[City Council](https://www.renotexas.us/Directory.aspx?DID=4)
Title: Mayor Pro Tem
Phone:
[903-785-6581](tel:9037856581)

[joey@renotexas.us](mailto:joey@renotexas.us)
Mr. McCarthy has been a Reno citizen for 10 years and councilman since 2012. He has 2 children. Mr. McCarthy graduated Paris High School, Paris Jr. College, and East Texas Police Academy. He has been a peace officer for 23 years and received his Master Peace Officer certification in 2007 and is currently employed by Lamar County Sheriff's Department.
"My goal is being an active voice for the citizens and promoting community growth, safety, and open government.
[Return to Staff Directory](https://www.renotexas.us/Directory.aspx)
